echo.message: Generate the META-INF/context.xml for tomcat to use

tasks.concat:
<!-- This file use to auto deploy to tomcat --> <Context antiJARLocking="true" antiResourceLocking="true">
<Resource name="jdbc/MerchantDS" auth="Container" type="javax.sql.DataSource" maxActive="100" maxIdle="30" maxWait="10000" username="${cbx.dbscript.db.user}" password="${cbx.dbscript.db.pwd}" driverClassName="oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver" url="jdbc:oracle:thin:@${cbx.dbscript.db.host}:1521:${cbx.dbscript.db.sid}" />
</Context>

repository.name: Core Maven repository in Archiva (e:/usr/local/apache-archiva-1.2.1, admin/core@123)
